page.title: 11Hobbies around Braunton.
page.content: There are lots of hobbies in Braunton as we found in our survey. Here are some of our results: Most{older people like{gardening,}they find it relaxing and look forward to the end result.The {younger person aged between 16-27}like {sport}e.g: football, tennis, bowls. It keeps them fit as well as being very enjoyable. It also provides a good social life. The most obvious way of keeping fit is running and daily exercise. Other hobbies of the younger generation include:drawing,reading and music. The facilities needed for these listed hobbies are colouring items, books and instruments.For the sporting hobbies if you really want to have proper gear you need goal posts and a football, tennis rackets and nets and bowling balls. So as you can see there are many varieties of hobbies in and around Braunton.
